p: In the true and the jack-knife sampled UK heterosexual population, we observed male heterosexuals with high degree (>20) not present in the Swiss data ( Fig. 4). The largest exclusively heterosexual cluster in the UK comprised 27 individuals (bootstrap = 0.9, GD = 4.5%); all heterosexuals with higher degree were in clusters dominated by MSM. When we dropped heterosexuals with degree >26 from the UK sample (125 individuals out of a total of 1556 heterosexuals), the DDQC distance between the two networks fell within its null distribution (DDQC = 0.17, Fig. 3).
